nodes.name: totalSupply
transfer
transferFrom
balanceOf
approve
allowance
massTransfer

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the remaining number of tokens that spender will be allowed		to spend on behalf of owner through transferFrom. This is zero by	default. This value changes when approve or transferFrom are called.
allowance(address,address).return: remaining number of tokens that spender will be allowed to spend		on behalf of owner through transferFrom.

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets the allowance amount of spender over the caller’s tokens.
approve(address,uint256).return: Boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.

balanceOf(address).details: Get the amount of tokens owned by account
balanceOf(address).return: The amount of tokens owned by account

constructor.details: Contract constructor. Function is invoked by inittial deployer of the   contract   - Gives the creator all initial tokens   - Updates total supply		- Sets the values for name, symbol, and decimals. All three of these			values are immutable: they can only be set once during construction.

params._decimalUnits: the decimal unit of the token

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation.		- E.g. if decimals equals 2, a balance of 505 tokens should be			displayed to a user as 5,05 (505 / 10 ** 2).

massTransfer(address[],uint256[]).details: Moves amounts of tokens from the caller’s account to several		recipients.

params.addresses: The address[] of the accounts to transfer tokens to

massTransfer(address[],uint256[]).return: Boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the		name.

totalSupply().details: Get the amount of tokens in existence.
totalSupply().return: the amount of tokens in existence.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Moves an amount of tokens from the caller’s account to recipient.Emits a Transfer event.

params._to: The address of the account to transfer tokens to

transfer(address,uint256).return: Boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Moves amount of tokens from sender to recipient using the allowance		mechanism. The amount is then deducted from the caller’s allowance.Emits a Transfer event.
transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: Boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
